column4: hi i have a belkin 802.11g wireless card, belkin told me it works with ubuntu 'out of the box' yet the live cd doesnt "see" any network devices. Should i bother installing ubuntu, if i cant see the wireless card ?
alaa, then its not out of the box :P ?
you will need a little time to make it work, but it's fairly easy
if it uses one of those broadcom chipsets?
